title: shankari shamkuru
sahitya:
shankari shamkuru candramukhi akhilANDEshvari shAmbhavi sarasija bhava vanditE gauri amba


anupallavi

  sankaTa hAriNi ripu vidAriNi kalyANi sadA nata phaladAyikE haranAyikE jagatjanani


caraNam 1    jambupati vilAsini jagadavannOlAsini kambukandharE bhavAni kapAladhAriNi shUlini
    caraNam 2    angaja ripu tOSiNi akhila bhuvana pOSiNi mangaLa pradE mrDAni marALa sannibha gamani
    caraNam 3    shyAmakrSNa sOdari shyAmaLE shAtOdari sAmagAna lOlE bAlE sadArthi bhanjana shIlE
